## bmp() function

Generates a bitmap image of the specified width and height with the specified procedure.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function bmp(width: number, height: number, procedure: BMPProcedure, opts?: BMPOptions): Promise<Buffer>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | number | The width of the bitmap to generate. |
|  height | number | The height of the bitmap to generate. |
|  procedure | [BMPProcedure](./bmp-gen.bmpprocedure.md) | The bitmap generator function used to populate the bitmap. |
|  opts | [BMPOptions](./bmp-gen.bmpoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional additional options to modify the bitmap. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Buffer&gt;

A promise resolving to a `Buffer` representing a bitmap image file. Can then be written to a file.

## Example

The following example generates a 16x16 bitmap filled with white pixels and writes it to the file `output.bmp`<!-- -->.

```
import { writeFile } from 'fs/promises';

import { bmp, Color24, fill } from 'bmp';

bmp(16, 16, fill(new Color24(255, 255, 255)))
    .then((data) => {
        writeFile('output.bmp', data).then(() => {
            console.log('output.bmp written successfully');
        });
    })
    .catch((err) => {
        throw err;
    });
```
